Output¶

class nexoclom.Output(inputs, npackets, compress=True)[source]¶

Bases: object

Keep track of packets initial and final positions x0, y0, z0, f0, vx0, vy0, vz0 phi0, lat0, lon0 time, x, y, z, vx, vy, vz index, npackets, totalsource
